wikipedia_page.main:
Maria Spilsbury (1776–1820) 
was a British artist known for her religious paintings and portraiture.

response: * Maria Spilsbury (1776–1820) – painter of religious subjects
Jonathan Spilsbury (1737?–1812) was an English engraver, the brother of John Spilsbury, with whom he has sometimes been confused, and father of Maria Spilsbury.
